item.title: About
item.description: Hello, I am Scott Sabol. I’ve wanted to start a website for some time now. I haven’t really figured out what it will be about, so bear with me as random topics, work, or ideas float out into the various posts. I initially thought it would be about I feel like a late comer to this whole website/technology/coding party, but am excited to learn and pick things up as I go.
